scripts.build: concurrently "cd client &&  env-cmd -f .env.production npm run build"
scripts.build:dev: concurrently  "cd client && env-cmd -f .env.development npm run build"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm run seed-admin-user" "cd server && PORT=3001 npm run start" "cd client && PORT=3000 env-cmd -f .env.production npm run start"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run seed-admin-user" "cd server && PORT=3001 npm run start" "cd client && PORT=3000  env-cmd -f .env.development npm run start:dev"
